channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Natural Language Processing with Ruby"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Natural Language Processing with Ruby"

item.title: Suggestion from Vassilis Rizopoulos (@)
item.description: Would loooove to see this. It will take me way back to my university years. Would be cool to see how to do in Ruby the things we did in C

item.title: Suggestion from Grzegorz Witek (@arnvald)
item.description: I'd love to see this presentation, as I'm interested in NLP and I haven't seen many resources about this related to Ruby language :)

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: I will leverage OpenNLP and JRuby as technologies to present a solution to the discussed real-world problem.

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description:
Yes please!! :-)

Is this pure Ruby NLP btw or is it using CoreNLP through JRuby wrappers for example?
